title: Delicious: A very nice free .otf font set for Mac & PC
content:
For consideration of the free font download page:

[http://www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/delicious.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20110821043428/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/delicious.html "http://www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/delicious.html")

Image from clipart.com - poem (revised) from antique greeting card.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110821043428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/delicious_3546.jpg)
author: fontplayer

comments.content: Anyone know more about Jos? Is he on typophile?

[Yes, he is](http://web.archive.org/web/20110821043428/http:/typophile.com/user/10199); formerly known as [Pille](http://web.archive.org/web/20110821043428/http:/typophile.com/user/3307).  
Check out [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20110821043428/http:/typophile.com/node/4372) about Josâ€™ first coup, Fontin.

Here is the FP using Fontin:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110821043428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fontin_4493.jpg)

Florian:

Thanks. Jos does really nice work. Amazed (and grateful) that he gives it way.
Jftr, there are some other real nice ones at his site that I haven't got around to fooling with yet, including a sans version of Fontin.
